Factsheet

Developer:
The Individuals
Based in Davis, California
Release date:
June 6, 2022
Platforms:
Windows / Linux / Mac
WebGL
Website:
github.com/rodsters/CrunchTime
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Cruch Time is a top-down dungeon crawler where you play to defeat time. As time counts down, the player must race to defeat all the enemies. Get fun upgrades and try to beat your best time!

History

Crunch Time was a project created by a group of students at UC Davis during Spring Quarter 2022 for ECS 189L: Gameplay Programming. The team formed from a cast of individuals, hence The Individuals ― yes, very creative. This ragtag crew came together with determined spirits and overambitious plans to create a real game with interesting gameplay systems! Wait, you're telling us they only had a few weeks to complete this thing! Well, you will just have to play the game to see if they have succeeded in such an endeavor.

Features

  • Race the clock with a time-based resource management system.
  • Rapid gunplay and combat.
  • Shop and upgrade system.
  • One main level dungeon to explore.
  • Smooth enemy pathfinding with steering and spacing behavior.
